DOC.brief_summary: The study will compare the safety and efficacy of Bimatoprost and Latanoprost in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bimatoprost Compared With Latanoprost in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension or chronic glaucoma Patient requires IOPlowering therapy in both eyes Uncontrolled medical conditions Hypersensitivity to study medications
